channel.title: Where to add?
channel.description:
Where can i add this in client.java
[code]case 3062: openUpBank(); break;[/code]
It's an item, not an object

item.title: Where to add?
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

[quote=“i_own__u, post:17, topic:112508”][quote author=LeScape Pk link=topic=160824.msg1507583#msg1507583 date=1182123918]

  1. learn how to make cases, you need { and } (sorry for teh flame :))
  2. here you go
case 2488://Runecraft alter	
{
if (actionTimer == 0) {
addItem(554, 2);
addItem(555, 2);
addItem(556, 2);
addItem(557, 2);
addItem(558, 2);
addItem(559, 2);
addItem(560, 2);
addItem(561, 2);
addItem(562, 2);
addItem(563, 2);
addItem(564, 2);
addItem(566, 2);
addItem(6529, 2);
sendMessage("You runecraft 2 of each rune!");
actionTimer = 20;
          }
}
break;

[/quote]

Dont forgot the Emote :D[/quote]
Np, i added

Read full topic

item.title: Where to add?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

  1. learn how to make cases, you need { and } (sorry for teh flame :))
  2. here you go
case 2488://Runecraft alter	
{
if (actionTimer == 0) {
addItem(554, 2);
addItem(555, 2);
addItem(556, 2);
addItem(557, 2);
addItem(558, 2);
addItem(559, 2);
addItem(560, 2);
addItem(561, 2);
addItem(562, 2);
addItem(563, 2);
addItem(564, 2);
addItem(566, 2);
addItem(6529, 2);
sendMessage("You runecraft 2 of each rune!");
actionTimer = 20;
          }
}
break;
